name: rikurou
normalized: …urk!
a bloody scene greets us as we step onto the main strip.
one of the buildings belonging the "jimmu group" was under attack by something.
the walls are in ruins like somebody's taken a wrecking ball to it.
every single one of the black passenger cars in the road have been turned to scrap metal with dead yakuza bodies strewn everywhere.
and it wasn't guns that did these guys in.
their mangledcorpses had been pulverized and ripped apart by someextreme force.
squabbles between organizations aren't uncommon but i've never seen such naked killing -- no, massacre.
however, the building's still alive with heavy shooting like the fighting's not over yet.

name: miki
normalized: eiichi!?
eiichi's here!
eiichi!
eiichi, it's me, miki!
are you in there!?
say something!
taken aback from the carnage, miki frantically cries out for her missing sibling.

name: rikurou
normalized: (but could he really be in a place like this?

name: werewolf
normalized: gyaoohh!
suddenly, i hear a familiar thunderous howl.
one of the walls on the building's third floor explodes from the inside and the werewolf jumps down.

name: rikurou
normalized: wha…!

name: miki
normalized: i-it's that monster…!

name: yakuza
normalized: goddamn werewolf, suck on this!
the yakuza that come flying out of the building line up the werewolf with a military-issue gatling gun and cut loose.
the red-hot stream of bullets hits its body but shows absolutely no effect.

name: werewolf
normalized: ggii!
ggii!
gyii!
the werewolf ignores the hail of gunfire as it swipes all over with its claws and slashes the yakuza to ribbons.
the amidahara yakuza, considerably powerful in their own right are butchered like animals one after another.

name: miki
normalized: this is awful… ooh, ngh…
tears well up in miki's eyes as she covers her mouth and falls to her knees at the werewolf's all too heartless slaughter.

name: annerose
normalized: so we flip the rock and find the werewolf, huh?
that yamada guy's got one twisted sense of humor.

name: rikurou
normalized: do you think he planned on making us… er, making you fight it?
i ask annerose while gently patting miki's back.

name: annerose
normalized: i'm not about to stick my nose in someone else's fight, but that arm i cut off this morning's already healed up.
come to look at it, she's right.
that right arm that bubbled away into nothing after she lopped it off is back as good as new.

name: annerose
normalized: looks like its regenerative powers really are a notchabove an actual werewolf.
annerose has the beginnings of a grin on.
though she has zero obligation to give the yakuza a hand, perhaps her oft-toted intuition was being tickled.
that's when i hear the terrified shriek of a yakuza saying, "s-sensei, take him out for us!
the shadow of a man appears from within the crumblingbuilding.

name: rikurou
normalized: isn't that…?
the man we saw at the duel yesterday.
the dual wieldingswordsman.

name: annerose
normalized: well, i'll be…
annerose sounds even more excited now.

name: annerose
normalized: it's that old forty-something mifune samurai.

name: rikurou
normalized: you mean asura.
asura mifune.

name: annerose
normalized: oh, that's right, asura.
huh, so now he's a bodyguard for the jimmu group, eh?
asura sends a glance our way.
i can't imagine he actually heard us, but i shudder under his piercing gaze all the same.
as if telling us to not interfere, asura faces off alone against the snarling werewolf.

name: annerose
normalized: hmhm, if that's how he wants it, then let's kick back and enjoy the show.
so saying, annerose crosses her arms.

name: werewolf
normalized: ggh… gghh…
the werewolf gives a low growl, clearly wary of asura.
can it sense his strength?

name: asura
normalized: you're an interesting one.
asura coolly unsheathes his swords.
long sword in the right hand, short sword in the left.
he points them at the werewolf and adopts a middle stance.
though he's done nothing but draw his weapons, he's exuding an incredible sense of pressure.
it's almost like he's grown a size larger.
annerose takes a quick breath next to me.

name: werewolf
normalized: giiyaahh!
the werewolf lunges for asura with a roar.

name: annerose
normalized: it's fast!

name: asura
normalized: hm…
asura glides beneath the werewolf's galeforce claws.

name: werewolf
normalized: gyaah!
gghyaahh!
the werewolf howls even louder as it chases asura down, swiping its claws non-stop.

name: annerose
normalized: damn, is it even faster than this morning!?
annerose voices her surprise.

name: rikurou
normalized: how is that possible!?

name: annerose
normalized: there's no mistake.
it's faster than when i slashed it.
not bad.
and that asura's no slouch either.
like a willow tickled by the breeze, asura continued to gently dodge the werewolf's attacks, now even stronger than this morning.
this dance-like fluidity isn't what you'd expect fromsomeone as gruff looking as him.

name: rikurou
normalized: (it almost reminds me of annerose…)

name: werewolf
normalized: ggh, ggii!
as if fed up with asura's continuous evading, the werewolf lunges forward, using the extra momentum to bring its right arm down.

name: asura
normalized: in the end you were but a beast.
lifting the long sword in his right hand, asura swings it horizontally across the descending claw, cutting thewerewolf's arm clean off.

name: werewolf
normalized: gghii!
ironically, it was the same arm annerose had lopped off this morning, and in essentially the same spot as well.

name: rikurou
normalized: that asura… do you think he was watching us from somewhere?

name: annerose
normalized: i doubt it.
he simply took advantage of an opening.

name: rikurou
normalized: with that crazy offense and defense…
he's terrifying.
but the werewolf isn't the same as before, either.
unhindered by its severed limb, it relentlessly attacks asura with its remaining arm.

name: asura
normalized: this creature… does it feel no pain?
slipping past its sidelong swipe, he sends its other arm flying as well with a flourish of his short sword.

name: werewolf
normalized: gii!
now bereft of both arms, the werewolf predictably takes a giant leap back, giving ground to asura.

name: rikurou
normalized: (is it going to run again?
that's what i thought, but it didn't happen.

name: werewolf
normalized: ghugii!
the werewolf shakes the earth with its roar.
then, flesh bubbles up from its bloody stumps as new arms take shape from the churning mass.

name: asura
normalized: hm…
even asura can't help but grunt in surprise.
the same goes for us, too.

name: annerose
normalized: what kind of regeneration is that?
it can regrow its arms in less than a second!
having created an immortal like me, annerose is completely flabbergasted.
yeah, there's no way i can do what it's making look so easy.
it takes quite a while to get a finger back, let alone an entire arm.
but what the werewolf has goes far beyond the realm of simple regeneration.

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose, is it an immortal too?
but then how can it regenerate so fast…

name: annerose
normalized: immortal… that's not it.
i do smell magic, but even so, it shouldn't be possible to pull that off without paying something in return.

name: rikurou
normalized: then how…?

name: annerose
normalized: watch.

name: rikurou
normalized: huh?
ah…!

name: werewolf
normalized: gii!
gugii!

the bodies glow a dark red and become motes of light before it hungrily sucks them up.

name: werewolf
normalized: giiyaahh!
the werewolf howls in rapture like a wolfman baying at the moon.

name: michiko
normalized: so that's the trick behind that insane ability.

name: annerose
normalized: the stories of it robbing the souls of the dead were true after all.
it absorbs souls to gain power.

name: miki
normalized: th-the souls of the dead…

name: werewolf
normalized: gyii!
and so, with fully healed arms and now stronger than ever, the werewolf attacks asura once more.
--or so it seemed.

name: werewolf
normalized: gii…?
because it suddenly veered off from asura and came bounding this way.

name: rikurou
normalized: (annerose!?
is it after revenge for this morning?

name: rikurou
normalized: wait, that's not it!

name: rikurou
normalized: (it's after miki again!

normalized: ah…!

name: werewolf
normalized: gii…

name: annerose
normalized: rick!
annerose shouts.

name: rikurou
normalized: (i'm on it!
i put miki behind me and stand in the werewolf's path.
i get down and prepare to take it head-on.

name: rikurou
normalized: you won't beat me so easily this time!

normalized: (er, and how do i figure that!?

its body slam blasts me into the air.

normalized: (n-not this agaain!

name: miki
normalized: rikurou!
miki screams.
it's the exact same setup as this morning.

name: rikurou
normalized: (annerose, the rest is all yoouu!

name: rikurou
normalized: huh…?

name: werewolf
normalized: ggh… ggii… gii…

name: miki
normalized: wh-what?
what is it?
what do you want…!?
she looks at the demonic beast before her with a mixture of fear and bewilderment.

name: rikurou
normalized: (what is annerose doing…?
i don't know what the werewolf's up to but it could shred miki like tissue paper with a single swipe.

name: werewolf
normalized: wuoonn!
oohhnn!
the werewolf suddenly howls.
but it's not like the ones we've heard so far.
it's a howl filled with despair, ill-suited to a soul eating monster that's turning the city into a killing grounds.
it almost sounds like it's crying.

name: miki
normalized: i-is it… crying?
miki got the same impression.
she looks up in wonder at the werewolf wailing in sorrow.
when just then…

gakiin!
the harsh sound of clashing swords.

name: asura
normalized: hnn…!

name: rikurou
normalized: (annerose protected miki… no, the werewolf!?

normalized: what is the meaning of this?

she's protecting them.

oowoohhn!

eiichi!

name: asura
normalized: lady annerose, today i give chase to that beast as a retainer of the jimmu group, but one day i shall fully savor your skill with the blade myself.
with the smile of a demon who'd found a worthy prey, asura disappears after the werewolf into the night.

name: annerose
normalized: can't believe he snuck a hidden blade past me.
